00056     struct base_random_generator {

00063     template <class T>
00064     struct random_generator: public base_random_generator {
00065         typedef boost::uniform_int<result_type> dist_t;
00066         typedef boost::variate_generator<T&, dist_t> gen_t;
00067         random_generator(T& g): gen(g,
00068             dist_t((std::numeric_limits<result_type>::min)(),
00069                 (std::numeric_limits<result_type>::max)())) { }
00070         result_type operator()() { return gen(); }
00071         gen_t gen;
